page.title: 10RELIGION TREDIS
page.content: SERVING THE AREA ARE THREE ANGLICAN CHURCHES AT ST.GERMANS,HESSENFORD AND DOWNDERRY, AND TWO METHODIST CHURCHES, AT POLBATHIC AND DOWNDERRY.UNTIL LAST YEAR THE METHODIST CHAPEL AT MINARD WAS STILL OCCASIONALLY USED,BUT IT IS NOW EMPTY AND UP FOR SALE. FROM A D-BLOCK POPULATION OF 299, 15 ATTEND THE ANGLICAN CHURCH AND EIGHT ARE METHODISTS. IN THE PAST YEAR WE HAVE LOST BOTH OUR ANGLICAN AND OUR METHODIST MINISTERS.THE FORMER WAS THE VICAR OF ST.GERMANS,WHO ALSO HAD RESPONSIBILITY FOR HESSENFORD, DOWNDERRY & TIDEFORD CHURCHES.FOLLOWING HIS PROMOTION WE NOW HAVE AN UNEASY INTERREGNUM. THE LATTER WAS A GIFTED AND INSPIRING LADY MINISTER, OPERATING FROM SALTASH.SHE HAS MOVED ON AND HER REPLACEMENT IS A LAY CLERIC OPERATING IN THIS AREA. ROMAN CATHOLICS GO TO LOOE OR TORPOINT
